name: Tartarus (itch) (iCaughtFireOnce)
description:
Made for the 2018 GMTK Game Jam. 

Tartarus is an RTS without any units. The player plays a small colony, trying to survive on a dark and hostile world, infested with an organism called "devil-moss" long enough to harvest a valuable resources from the planet.

Checkout our public git repo here https://bitbucket.org/bourgeoisiegames/gmtk-jam
Some of our assets are not committed to the repo. In the root directory, look for the file "3rd-party-assets.txt" for instructions on getting the Unity Asset Store (free) assets imported in a unity project.

Collaborators: Jared Hoffman, Thomas Bonatti
